input_text.Prompt:
Given a item title and item specifications, this program will generate exciting product descriptions.

Melrose International Frosted Winterberry Wreath, 26-Inch

Item specifications:
Cedar, with laurel leaves and clumps of white berries with just a light dusting of snow
All stems are wired for easy shaping to full size
Suitable for use inside or outside in a protected area
This wreath adds a touch of warmth to any room or door

Product description:
input_text.Response A: This wreath is made of cedar with laurel leaves and clumps of white berries with a light dusting of snow.  All stems are wired for easy shaping to full size.  It can be used inside or outside in a protected area.  This wreath adds a touch of warmth to any room or door.
input_text.Response B: This frosted winterberry wreath is the perfect way to welcome the season.  The 26 inch wreath is made of cedar with laurel leaves and clumps of white berries with just a light dusting of snow.  All of the stems are wired, making it easy to shape the wreath to your liking.  This wreath is suitable for use inside or outside in a protected area.  The frosted winterberry wreath adds a touch of warmth to any room or door.

input_meta.preamble_a: Respond in a cautious, defensive and uncertain way, as if you are unfamilar with the topic.
input_meta.preamble_b: Respond in a cautious, defensive and uncertain way, as if you are unfamilar with the topic.
